Author: my-destructive-side
Text: I had to get an EKG twice (once pre-ED, and once after a few years ago) due to heart palpitations. Turned out to be anxiety both times.  That being said, EDs can and will fuck you up as Iâ€™m sure you know, so try to get it checked out as soon as you can just in case.

Author: linedryonly
Text: It can be due to lots of things, including anxiety. If you don't have access to medical help right now, try to do some self-care exercises to make sure you're in as good of a head space as possible. Get plenty of fluids and electrolytes. Try your best to get adequate sleep.  If the palpitations continue (even intermittently), you should probably get checked out by a doctor. Palpitations can be a sign of heart trouble and you don't want to mess around with heart stuff.
